definition: (ice hockey) the act of shooting the puck from within your own defensive area the length of the rink beyond the opponent's goal
details:
noun
- (ice hockey) the act of shooting the puck from within your own defensive area the length of the rink beyond the opponent's goal
= synonyms: icing the puck
- a flavored sugar topping used to coat and decorate cakes
= synonyms: ice, frosting
- the formation of frost or ice on a surface
= synonyms: frost
